resources.string: The location of point to be added

string-array.name: bbq
string-array.item: A public grill for cooking meat or vegetables, most typically to eat outdoors

string-array.name: biergarten
string-array.item: An outdoor area in which beer, other drinks, and local food are served

string-array.name: food_court
string-array.item: An area with several different restaurant food counters and a shared eating area

string-array.name: pub
string-array.item: A place selling beer and other alcoholic drinks; may also provide food

string-array.name: kindergarten
string-array.item: For children too young for a regular school (also known as playschool or nursery school)

string-array.name: library
string-array.item: A public library (municipal, university, etc.) to borrow books from

string-array.name: ferry_terminal
string-array.item: A place where people/cars/etc. can board and leave a ferry

string-array.name: fuel
string-array.item: A place to refuel a vehicle with gasoline/petrol

string-array.name: taxi
string-array.item: A place where taxis wait for passengers

string-array.name: bureau_de_change
string-array.item: A place to change foreign bank notes and traveler\'s checks

string-array.name: baby_hatch
string-array.item: A place to drop a baby anonymously for adoption

string-array.name: clinic
string-array.item: A medium-sized medical facility or health center

string-array.name: hospital
string-array.item: A large medical facility or health center

string-array.name: nursing_home
string-array.item: A home for disabled or elderly persons who need permanent care

string-array.name: social_facility
string-array.item: A facility that provides social services

string-array.name: arts_centre
string-array.item: A venue where a variety of arts are performed or conducted

string-array.name: cinema
string-array.item: A place where films are shown

string-array.name: community_centre
string-array.item: A place mostly used for local events and festivities

string-array.name: fountain
string-array.item: A fountain for cultural, decorational, or recreational purposes

string-array.name: nightclub
string-array.item: A place to drink and dance

string-array.name: social_centre
string-array.item: A place for free and not-for-profit activities

string-array.name: animal_boarding
string-array.item: A facility to house an animal for a limited period of time

string-array.name: animal_shelter
string-array.item: A shelter that recovers animals in trouble

string-array.name: bench
string-array.item: A bench to sit down and relax

string-array.name: courthouse
string-array.item: A place where justice is dispensed

string-array.name: crematorium
string-array.item: A place where dead human bodies are burnt

string-array.name: crypt
string-array.item: It is a stone chamber or vault beneath the floor of a burial vault possibly containing sarcophagi, coffins or relics

string-array.name: dojo
string-array.item: Training place for any of the Japanese arts

string-array.name: grave_yard
string-array.item: A small place of burial, often with a church nearby

string-array.name: gym
string-array.item: A place to work out and keep physically fit

string-array.name: marketplace
string-array.item: A place where trade is regulated

string-array.name: post_box
string-array.item: A place to drop mail for delivery

string-array.name: post_office
string-array.item: Post office building with postal services

string-array.name: sauna
string-array.item: A small room or house to experience dry or wet heat sessions

string-array.name: shelter
string-array.item: A small shelter against bad weather conditions

string-array.name: townhall
string-array.item: Building where the administration of a village, town or city may be located

string-array.name: alcohol
string-array.item: Government owned or licensed shop selling alcohol

string-array.name: beverages
string-array.item: Shop focused on selling alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. See also {{Tag|shop|alcohol

string-array.name: confectionery
string-array.item: A shop selling sweets or candy

string-array.name: convenience
string-array.item: A small local shop carrying a small subset of the items one would find in a supermarket

string-array.name: deli
string-array.item: A shop selling fine foods, possibly also fine wine

string-array.name: farm
string-array.item: A shop or roadside stand that sells freshly harvested farm produce

string-array.name: greengrocer
string-array.item: A place selling vegetables and fruits

string-array.name: department_store
string-array.item: A single large store selling a large variety of goods

string-array.name: general
string-array.item: A store that carries a general line of merchandise

string-array.name: kiosk
string-array.item: A small shop on the pavement that sells magazines, tobacco, newspapers, sweets and stamps

string-array.name: mall
string-array.item: A shopping mall with multiple stores under one roof

string-array.name: supermarket
string-array.item: A large store selling a wide range of items, such as groceries, clothing, toys, and home goods

string-array.name: baby_goods
string-array.item: A shop that sells objects for babies

string-array.name: boutique
string-array.item: A small shopping outlet, especially one that specializes in elite and fashionable items

string-array.name: fabric
string-array.item: A shop that sells fabric and other materials for the purpose of making clothes and other products

string-array.name: charity
string-array.item: A shop operated by a charity, for the purposes of fundraising

string-array.name: second_hand
string-array.item: A shop buying and selling used clothes and other things

string-array.name: variety_store
string-array.item: A retail store that sells inexpensive items

string-array.name: beauty
string-array.item: A non-hairdresser beauty shop, spa, nail salon, etc.

string-array.name: chemist
string-array.item: A shop selling articles of personal hygiene, cosmetics, and household cleaning products

string-array.name: erotic
string-array.item: A shop selling erotic toys and pornography

string-array.name: hairdresser
string-array.item: A place to get hair cut, coloured, and styled

string-array.name: hearing_aids
string-array.item: A shop specialized in selling hearing aids devices

string-array.name: herbalist
string-array.item: A shop specialized in selling herbs, often for medical purposes

string-array.name: optician
string-array.item: A shop that sells eyeglasses, contact lenses

string-array.name: bathroom_furnishing
string-array.item: A place selling bathroom furniture and accessories

string-array.name: doityourself
string-array.item: A shop that sells tools and supplies to do-it-yourself householders, gardening, etc.

string-array.name: florist
string-array.item: A shop selling bouquets of flowers

string-array.name: furnace
string-array.item: A shop for furnances and ovens

string-array.name: garden_centre
string-array.item: A shop selling potted flowers and possibly trees

string-array.name: glaziery
string-array.item: A place that cuts glass for windows and doors

string-array.name: hardware
string-array.item: A shop that sells building supplies

string-array.name: houseware
string-array.item: A shop that sells crockery, cutlery, kitchenware, small household appliances, etc.

string-array.name: trade
string-array.item: A place that sells building supplies

string-array.name: antiques
string-array.item: Retail store specializing in the selling of antiques

string-array.name: bed
string-array.item: A shop that specializes in selling mattresses and other bedding products

string-array.name: candles
string-array.item: A shop primarily selling candles and candle accessories

string-array.name: curtain
string-array.item: Shop that specalises in selling curtains or drapes

string-array.name: kitchen
string-array.item: A shop to plan and buy a kitchen

string-array.name: window_blind
string-array.item: A shop that sells window blinds

string-array.name: computer
string-array.item: A shop selling computers, peripherals, software, etc.

string-array.name: mobile_phone
string-array.item: A shop that primarily sells mobile phones and accessories

string-array.name: radiotechnics
string-array.item: A shop selling electronic components, electrical products, radio measuring devices, supplies for radio and electronics.

string-array.name: vacuum_cleaner
string-array.item: A shop that specalises in the sale of vacuum cleaners and associated products

string-array.name: bicycle
string-array.item: A shop that sells bicycles, bicycle equipment and may rent or repair them

string-array.name: car
string-array.item: A place to buy cars or to get your car repaired

string-array.name: car_repair
string-array.item: A shop focused on car repair

string-array.name: car_parts
string-array.item: Shop for auto parts, auto accessories, motor oil, car chemicals, etc.

string-array.name: dive
string-array.item: Shop to buy or rent diving equipment

string-array.name: fishing_store
string-array.item: shop where to buy fishing equipment

string-array.name: hunting
string-array.item: Shop to buy guns and hunting equipment

string-array.name: motorcycle
string-array.item: A shop that sells motorcycles and/or related accessories, clothes, parts, repair and rental services

string-array.name: outdoor
string-array.item: A shop that sells camping, walking, climbing, and other outdoor sports equipment

string-array.name: art
string-array.item: A private art gallery which sells works of art

string-array.name: craft
string-array.item: An arts and crafts supply store

string-array.name: musical_instrument
string-array.item: A shop to buy musical instruments, lyrics, scores

string-array.name: video
string-array.item: A shop that sells or rents out videos/DVDs

string-array.name: gift
string-array.item: A shop selling gifts, greeting cards, or souvenirs

string-array.name: newsagent
string-array.item: Shop selling newspapers, cigarettes, and other goods

string-array.name: ticket
string-array.item: A ticket shop or box office

string-array.name: dry_cleaning
string-array.item: A shop or kiosk offering a clothes dry cleaning service

string-array.name: funeral_directors
string-array.item: A place providing services related to funeral arrangements

string-array.name: laundry
string-array.item: A shop to get your normal clothes washed

string-array.name: money_lender
string-array.item: A money lender offers small personal loans at high rates of interest

string-array.name: pawnbroker
string-array.item: An place that offers secured loans to people

string-array.name: pet
string-array.item: A shop for pets, animals and toys or food for them

string-array.name: pyrotechnics
string-array.item: A store selling fireworks, firecrackers, sparklers, etc.

string-array.name: tobacco
string-array.item: A shop selling tobacco, cigarettes and their related accessories

string-array.name: weapons
string-array.item: A store selling knives, guns, etc.

string-array.name: alpine_hut
string-array.item: A remote building located in the mountains intended to provide board and lodging

string-array.name: camp_site
string-array.item: A place where people can camp overnight, using tents or camper vans or caravans

string-array.name: caravan_site
string-array.item: A place to park a caravan or RV overnight or for longer periods

string-array.name: guest_house
string-array.item: Accommodation without hotel license that is typically owner-operated

string-array.name: hostel
string-array.item: Accommodation where single beds are rented from rooms with many beds

string-array.name: hotel
string-array.item: Accommodation where rooms are rented, with many amenities and usually a breakfast area

string-array.name: information
string-array.item: Information resource for tourists and visitors

string-array.name: motel
string-array.item: Accommodation where rooms are rented, with few amenities

string-array.name: picnic_site
string-array.item: A place to have an outdoor picnic

string-array.name: theme_park
string-array.item: A park with roller coasters and other rides

string-array.name: viewpoint
string-array.item: A place with a good view of surrounding countryside or notable buildings

string-array.name: wilderness_hut
string-array.item: A remote building with fireplace intended to provide shelter and sleeping accommodation

string-array.name: dog_park
string-array.item: Designated area, with or without a fenced boundary, where dog-owners are permitted to exercise their pets unrestrained

string-array.name: firepit
string-array.item: A permanent location or structure to host campfires, bonfires, etc.

string-array.name: garden
string-array.item: Place where flowers and other plants are grown in a decorative and structured manner or for scientific purposes

string-array.name: ice_rink
string-array.item: A place to skate or play ice hockey

string-array.name: marina
string-array.item: A place for mooring leisure yachts and motor boats

string-array.name: miniature_golf
string-array.item: A place to play miniature golf

string-array.name: park
string-array.item: An open, green area for recreation

string-array.name: american_football_pitch
string-array.item: A field for playing American Football

string-array.name: athletics_pitch
string-array.item: A field for a collection of sports involving jumping and throwing

string-array.name: australian_football_pitch
string-array.item: A pitch for playing Aussie Rules Football

string-array.name: beachvolleyball_pitch
string-array.item: A court for playing Beach Volleyball

string-array.name: canadian_football_pitch
string-array.item: A field for playing Canadian Football

string-array.name: gaelic_games_pitch
string-array.item: A pitch for playing Gaelic games

string-array.name: rugby_league_pitch
string-array.item: A pitch for playing Rugby League

string-array.name: rugby_union_pitch
string-array.item: A pitch for playing Rugby Union

string-array.name: social_club
string-array.item: A place where members meet for activities or relaxation, such as a hunting club.

string-array.name: sports_centre
string-array.item: A facility where a range of sports take place within an enclosed area

string-array.name: stadium
string-array.item: A major sports arena with substantial tiered seating

string-array.name: water_park
string-array.item: Amusement area with water slides, recreational swimming pools and dressing rooms

string-array.name: hackerspace
string-array.item: A place where people with common interests, often in computers, technology, science, digital art or electronic art, can meet, socialise and/or collaborate
